page.title: 12LOCAL NEWS-EVENTS-REPORTS
page.content: The following are some news items of Offords and Great Paxton. BIRTHDAY FOR GUIDES-Buckden and Offord Guides held an open morning at Offord Village Hall at 10'30am.There will be a Web of Friendship display on June 2nd as an Anniversary to mark 75 years of Guiding.They are holding a birthday party at Buckden Village Hall from 7 to 9pm on June 28th. Guider in charge is Pat King. GREAT PAXTON W.I.-19 members were present at the April meeting.It was announced that Â£72:67 had been collected for Dr.Barnardo's Homes.Liz Smith gave a cake icing demonstration.A competition for an interesting spoon was won by Mrs.D.Phillips.Mrs.King brought along her bottle of wine which won 1st prize
